name: HD TimeLines
description:
* Added QUIZ INVENTIONS & DISCOVERIES, ranking with GameCenter!

Timelines inventions and discoveries is a time line, with a simple and intuitive interface, which displays more than 400 inventions and discoveries.
You can slide freely with the touch of a finger the long path of the time between inventions of mankind or search directly in the line a word or an inventor
More than 400 between inventions and discoveries
